response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for you. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth every bit of its $800,000 value to you. Considering this significant investment, I propose an offer of $750,000 for the product. This offer not only allows you to acquire a valuable asset but also leaves room for negotiation if needed. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 750000}
